languages.text: "Руины начинают светиться и нагреваться. Ауспексы фиксируют лавинообразный рост дюжины излучений разных спектров. Разведчиков обуяло темное предчувствие, они ждут приказа".

"The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."
languages.original_text: "Руины начинают светиться и нагреваться. Ауспексы фиксируют лавинообразный рост дюжины излучений разных спектров. Разведчиков обуяло темное предчувствие, они ждут приказа".

traits.locale_text: "The ruins are lighting up and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

"The ruins are lighting up and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

"The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

"The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

"The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

"The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

languages.text: “废墟正在发光，温度逐渐上升，各种光谱上的辐射都在激增。侦察兵们产生了不祥的预感，他们正在等待进一步的指示。”
languages.original_text: "The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

traits.locale_text: “废墟正在发光，温度逐渐上升，各种光谱上的辐射都在激增。侦察兵们产生了不祥的预感，他们正在等待进一步的指示。”

languages.text: «Las ruinas se iluminan y la temperatura aumenta. Los aúspex captan un rápido aumento de las emisiones en varios espectros. Hay una sensación de mal presentimiento entre los exploradores. Están a la espera de nuevas órdenes».
languages.original_text: "The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

traits.locale_text: «Las ruinas se iluminan y la temperatura aumenta. Los aúspex captan un rápido aumento de las emisiones en varios espectros. Hay una sensación de mal presentimiento entre los exploradores. Están a la espera de nuevas órdenes».

languages.text: 「廃墟は照らされ、気温は上昇しています。アウスペクスはさまざまなスペクトルの放出量の急激な増加を拾っています。偵察隊は、不穏な雰囲気が漂う中、さらなる命令を待っています」
languages.original_text: "The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

traits.locale_text: 「廃墟は照らされ、気温は上昇しています。アウスペクスはさまざまなスペクトルの放出量の急激な増加を拾っています。偵察隊は、不穏な雰囲気が漂う中、さらなる命令を待っています」

languages.text: « Les ruines émettent de la lumière et la température ne cesse de croître. Les auspex détectent une augmentation rapide des émissions sur plusieurs spectres différents. L'angoisse est palpable parmi les éclaireurs qui, la mine sombre, attendent leurs ordres. »
languages.original_text: "The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

traits.locale_text: « Les ruines émettent de la lumière et la température ne cesse de croître. Les auspex détectent une augmentation rapide des émissions sur plusieurs spectres différents. L'angoisse est palpable parmi les éclaireurs qui, la mine sombre, attendent leurs ordres. »

languages.text: "Die Ruinen werden erleuchtet, und die Temperatur steigt. Die Auspizien bemerken einen rasanten Anstieg von Emissionen in verschiedenen Spektren. Den Spähern schwant Übles, die Stimmung ist gedrückt. Sie warten auf weitere Befehle."
languages.original_text: "The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ruinen werden erleuchtet, und die Temperatur steigt. Die Auspizien bemerken einen rasanten Anstieg von Emissionen in verschiedenen Spektren. Den Spähern schwant Übles, die Stimmung ist gedrückt. Sie warten auf weitere Befehle."

languages.text: "Harabeler ışıldıyor, hava sıcaklığı ise artıyor. Uzgörenler, envaiçeşit salınımın hızlı bir şekilde arttığını algıladı. Keşif erleri arasında kötü bir şey olacağına dair uğursuz bir his hâkim. Gelecek emirler için hazırda bekliyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The ruins are illuminating and the temperature is rising. The auspexes are picking up a rapid increase in emissions on various spectra. There is a sense of grim foreboding among the scouts. They are standing by for further orders."
